title: Vaccination
cleaned_text: Personal Choices Paperback June 2010 9780863157349 [More details](#) - Publisher Floris Books - Published 22nd June 2010 - ISBN 9780863157349 - Language English - Pages 96 pp. $13.95 Many parents are content to follow official recommendations about vaccination, whereas others avoid any vaccinations at all for their children. This little guide helps parents arrive at their own informed conclusion, based on clear, factual information. The authors explain the levels of danger for various diseases and explain how different kinds of vaccinations work, exploring their benefits as well as possible risks. This is the second edition of this useful handbook for parents, fully revised and updated with the latest guidelines and recommendations.
